rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 11, 42, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MBA5906, MBA9006, MKF5461, MKF5916, MKX5461, MKX5955, MKX9160, MKX9550} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {MBA5014, MBA6400%, MBA6401, MBA6402, MBA640S, MKF5260, MKF5260%, MKP9740}
Unit was previously coded {MBA5014, MBA6400%, MBA6401, MBA6402, MBA640S, MKF5260, MKF5260%, MKP9740}
For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {2098, 2276, 3844, 4431, B6005, B6007, B6010} Do Permission required Otherwise true

description: Competition in the global arena is increasingly dynamic. It is critical for businesses to achieve and sustain competitive advantage through maintaining effective and efficient global marketing operations. This unit aims to assist students in acquiring a deeper understanding of market opportunities and techniques to identify, develop, monitor and manage global marketing strategies in the international marketing environment.
